  • Uses of SitesConfigurationBuilder in org.infinispan.configuration.cache

    Methods in org.infinispan.configuration.cache that return SitesConfigurationBuilder
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    SitesConfigurationBuilder
    SitesConfigurationBuilder.addInUseBackupSite(String site)
    Defines the site names, from the list of sites names defined within 'backups' element, to which this cache backups its data.
    SitesConfigurationBuilder
    SitesConfigurationBuilder.disableBackups(boolean disable)
    Returns true if this cache won't backup its data remotely.
    SitesConfigurationBuilder
    SitesConfigurationBuilder.maxTombstoneCleanupDelay(long value)
    Sets the maximum delay, in milliseconds, between which the tombstone cleanup task runs.
    SitesConfigurationBuilder
    SitesConfigurationBuilder.mergePolicy(XSiteEntryMergePolicy<?,?> mergePolicy)
    Configures the XSiteEntryMergePolicy to be used.
